prompt: Talk about a great time you had with a family member or friend. What happened and why was it memorable?
Describe a party or celebration you enjoyed. Who was there and what did you do?
Tell me about a time you helped someone. What happened and how did you feel?
Talk about a time you travelled somewhere new. Who did you go with and what did you do?
Describe an experience when you learned something important.
Tell me about a time you achieved a goal. What was the goal and how did you achieve it?
Describe a time when you had to overcome a challenge. What did you do?
Talk about a special day you spent with someone. Why was it special?
Tell me about a time you received good news. What was it and how did you react?
Describe a fun activity you did at school or at work. Why did you enjoy it?
Talk about a time when you made a new friend. How did you meet and what did you do together?
Describe a memorable family gathering or event. What made it memorable?
Tell me about a time you solved a difficult problem. How did you manage it?
Describe a time you felt proud of yourself. What did you do?
Talk about a time when something unexpected happened. How did you handle the situation?
Describe a time you tried something for the first time. What was it like?
Tell me about a time you received a compliment. Who gave it to you and how did you feel?
Talk about a time when you were disappointed. What happened and what did you learn?
Describe a time you participated in a team activity. What was your role?
Tell me about a time you faced a difficult decision. How did you make your choice?
